page.title: 15OUR HOBBIES AT 10 & 11YRS.
page.content:
I am{Helen.}I live in{Jeremy's Lane, {Bolney.}My favourite hobby is{reading. I enjoy{Enid Blyton and Alison Uttley. I have lots of books. My other hobby is being with{rabbits. I have 2 called{Smokey & Hazel.}I feed & clean them out every day. They have a big hutch & a pen.They are my favourite animals.{I have seen lots of {wild rabbits,some foxes & a young owl.
I am{Lisa.}I live in{Broxmead Lane, {Cuckfield.}My favourite hobbies are {horseriding,swimming,running,camping, {sewing and making things out of cane. This year I went camping with the school. On Thursdays I go riding. I go swimming every day at school. I do sewing and sometimes cane-work on Tuesday afternoons at school.I run nearly every day at home in the fields.
